Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1979...
Injured on 6/21/1980 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/30/1984 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1986, off Hugh Ly (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1986, off John Malone (SYR)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1986, hitting .210 with 19 HR, 59 RBI...
Injured on 8/12/1988 with a Broken Ulna, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/4/1992 to a 5-year deal worth $5,555,000 per year...
